discussionList.codeReviewSessions:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for code review sessions section when no discussions are present.
**UI Location**: Student mentoring dropdown → Discussion list → No discussions state
**When Users See This**: When there are no code review discussions started for an exercise.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Code Review Sessions"
discussionList.appearHereOnceStarted:
**Functional Purpose**: Explanatory text for the absence of code review discussions.
**UI Location**: Student mentoring dropdown → Discussion list → No discussions state
**When Users See This**: When there are no code review discussions started for an exercise.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Your code review discussions with mentors for this exercise will appear here once started."
discussionList.mentoringDiscussions:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the list of mentoring discussions.
**UI Location**: Student mentoring dropdown → Discussion list
**When Users See This**: When there are one or more mentoring discussions for an exercise.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Mentoring discussions"
header.mentoringCurrentlyInProgress:
**Functional Purpose**: Header indicating that mentoring is actively in progress.
**UI Location**: Student mentoring dropdown → Header → In-progress state
**When Users See This**: When the solution's mentoring status is 'in_progress'.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Mentoring currently in progress"
header.shareLinksNotAvailable:
**Functional Purpose**: Message explaining why share links are not available during active mentoring.
**UI Location**: Student mentoring dropdown → Header → In-progress state
**When Users See This**: When the solution's mentoring status is 'in_progress'.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Share links aren't available with active mentoring"
header.wantToGetMentored:
**Functional Purpose**: Header prompting the user to get mentored.
**UI Location**: Student mentoring dropdown → Header → Share link state
**When Users See This**: When the solution is not actively being mentored.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Want to get mentored by a friend?"
header.inviteFriendsColleagues:
**Functional Purpose**: Explanatory text on how to use the share link for mentoring.
**UI Location**: Student mentoring dropdown → Header → Share link state
**When Users See This**: When the solution is not actively being mentored.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Use this share link to invite friends, colleagues or personal mentors directly to mentor your solution."
exerciseStatusChart.invalidStatus:
**Functional Purpose**: Error message for an unexpected exercise status.
**UI Location**: Internal error handling for ExerciseStatusChart
**When Users See This**: Developer sees this if an invalid exercise status is encountered, indicating a bug.
**Technical Context**: This string is part of an error message thrown when an exercise status does not match any expected values (e.g., 'locked', 'available').
**Current English**: "Invalid status"
markAsComplete:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text for marking an exercise as complete.
**UI Location**: Exercise page (main content area), on the "Mark as Complete" button.
**When Users See This**: When viewing an exercise and it's ready to be marked as complete.
**Technical Context**: Standard button text.
**Current English**: "Mark as complete"
